item.title: Why Projects Fail
item.description: Regardless of your title or degree of experience, any misstep could result in a failed project. It’s a good habit to review the following two slide shows, if nothing else to provide a good confirmation that you are on the right track. Why Projects Fail: Obstacles and Solutions View more documents from Michael Krigsman. Rome Death March Nov2009 View more documents from yourdon. Related articles Why Software Projects Fail (ribomation.
